sentences.sContent: The large, rich peony flowers look great in gardens and this is exactly why they are often seen as part of outdoors arrangements.
sentences.sContent_eng: The large, rich peony flowers look great in gardens and this is exactly why they are often seen as part of outdoors arrangements.
sentences.sCn: 花园里花朵大大的、富丽堂皇的牡丹花看上去美极了，这就是为什么我们总能在户外布景看到它们。

trans.tranOther: a garden plant with large round flowers that are dark red, white, or pink
